summary: Completed comprehensive backend and frontend testing of FITQUEST sports application. Fixed critical AI meal generation bug and validated all major features including Google Auth, Gemini AI integration, exercise database (33 exercises), and French UI implementation.

flaky_endpoints.issue: AI meal generation occasionally times out due to Gemini API response time
flaky_endpoints.impact: User may experience slower meal generation (15-30 seconds)
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Functionality works correctly, just requires patience

design_issues.issue: Active page highlighting could be more prominent

passed_tests: API /api/exercises returns exactly 33 exercises with all required fields and categories
API /api/auth/me returns authenticated user (Alex Fitness) with complete profile data
API /api/performance/stats returns comprehensive performance statistics
Meals CRUD operations (create, read, delete) working correctly
Workouts API accessible and returns user workouts
AI meal generation with Google Gemini working after model name fix
Login page displays with FITQUEST branding and proper French text
Dashboard shows user stats cards, calendar, meals, and upcoming workouts correctly
Repas page displays AI generation card, manual meal add, and meal list with nutrition info
Sport page shows interactive week calendar, workout creation, and exercise selection
Performance page displays weight tracking chart, weekly activity, and personal records
Profile page shows user info, physical stats, objectives, and working settings toggles
Navigation between all pages works correctly with proper routing
Sidebar navigation highlights active page (though could be more prominent)
Mobile responsive design with working hamburger menu toggle
All interactive buttons are clickable and properly integrated with backend APIs
FITQUEST brand colors (Green #B0E301, Purple #6441a5) properly implemented throughout UI
Comprehensive French language implementation across all pages and components
All dialog/modal interactions functional for meal creation, workout planning, profile editing
Quick action buttons on dashboard navigate to correct pages
Week calendar navigation (previous/next week) working correctly
Exercise database integration in workout creation
Settings toggles for notifications and dark mode functional
